casebody.data:
No. 09-773. Steven Lerman, et al., Petitioners v. City of Fort Lauderdale, Florida. 559 U.S. 940, 130 S. Ct. 1543,

176 L. Ed. 2d 116,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 1465. February 22, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit denied.

Same case below, 346 Fed. Appx. 500.
